    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseManager

        public DatabaseManager(Session _s)
        Use 'lndb' as the database name. Regular users will connect as ln_user and will have restricted access (no delete etc.). Connect as ln_admin to get administrative privileges.

      • groupPlates

        public void groupPlates(CustomTable _table)
        Launched by the Plate menu item "group". Since by definition a plate set can only have one format of plate, no need to check that there is only one format

      • reformatPlateSet

        public void reformatPlateSet(CustomTable _table)
        Collapse multiple plates by quadrant.

        Plate set table: id|plate_set_name|descr| plate_set_sys_name | num_plates| plate_format_id|plate_type_id|project_id |updated
